data.name: Net VR Theater
data.detailed_description:
𝗩𝗶𝗿𝘁𝘂𝗮𝗹 𝗟𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝗦𝘁𝗿𝗲𝗮𝗺𝗶𝗻𝗴/𝗦𝗼𝗰𝗶𝗮𝗹 𝗣𝗹𝗮𝘁𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗺
Welcome to the next evolution of streaming! Take your community "virtual" in a hosted, cinema themed 3D space!

Current Features
- Text and Voice communication (3d spatial sound)
- Dedicated theater hosting for users to start and stop
- Streaming service API integration for chat and video
- Direct streaming of video feed through an OBS of your choice into your theater
- Customizable theater options and administration
- VR Support (early development)
- Progression and level tracking system currently based on view time
- Avatar customization and clothing option (Press P)
More features to come, as we are in Alpha phase we are looking for more testers and ideas!
data.about_the_game:

Welcome to the next evolution of streaming! Take your community "virtual" in a hosted, cinema themed 3D space!

data.short_description: Welcome to the next evolution of streaming! Take your community "virtual" in a hosted, cinema themed 3D space!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.5 GHz (or greater)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 9xxx / ATI 2xxx (or greater)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX9 Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS 10
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz Core i5 (I5-8210Y) (or greater)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: The game itself does not contain any of these aspects however, some theaters may be streaming mature content. There will be a warning you must accept before viewing on streams flagged as mature.
